column4: i installed 6.06 on this inspiron 9400 with no prøblems at all then 7.04 came out bit i have not been able to install it 100% when it´s done i get errors about X not being OK.

now i tried 7.10 and get "the display server has been shutdown about 6 times in the last 90 seconds, it is likly that somthing bada is going on. waiting for 2 minutes before trying again on display:0"--- does anyone know what could be wrong ?
it's messing up autodetection.  You'll just have to go and edit the /etc/X11/xorg.conf file manually
i tried aditing the xorg, someone helped me but i still couldnt get it running.
